summary:
Hives are a skin rash with red, itchy bumps that can burn or sting. They can appear anywhere on the body and usually last for a short time, but some cases can last for weeks or even months. Hives are often caused by allergies, infections, or stress. Sometimes, the cause is unknown.

Treatment includes avoiding triggers and taking antihistamines to reduce itching. For severe cases, corticosteroids or other medications may be needed. Many people experience hives at some point, and they can affect people of all ages.
title: Hives
